long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small utility (and joking) app to input fixed phrase/emote on comment text box on channels you choose.

Behavior is not stable. Additionally, implementation strongly depends on Twitch's UI. So it may not work one day. Don't use this app for important use cases.
